DECLARE BEGIN INSERT INTO CUST_ACTION_INFO( CUST_ID, CUST_ACTION_WAY_CODE, EMP_ID, CUST_ACTION_STATE_CODE, CUST_ACTION_TIME, CUST_ACTION_CONTENT, PURCHASE_TEND_CODE, ACTION_TYPE_CODE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, ACTIVITY, ORDER_NO, MOBILEPHONE, CONTACT ) VALUES( #CUST_ID#, #CUST_ACTION_WAY_CODE#, #EMP_ID#, IFNULL(#CUST_ACTION_STATE_CODE#,'CustActionState001'), str_to_date(#CUST_ACTION_TIME#,'%Y-%m-%d'), #CUST_ACTION_CONTENT#, #PURCHASE_TEND_CODE#, #ACTION_TYPE_CODE#,#CREATED_BY#, NOW(), 1, CUST_ACTION_SEQ.CURRVAL, (SELECT MAX(CONTACTS_MOBILE1) FROM CUST_CONTACTS WHERE CUST_ID=#CUST_ID# AND CONTACTS_NAME=#CONTACT# ), #CONTACT#);
END;
